text: saansaarik jeevan to aisa hee hai, jaise hamane aakaash se jal barasaaya, jisase dharatee kee upaj ghanee ho gayee, jisamen se log aur pashu khaate hain. phir jab, vah samay aaya ki dharatee ne apanee shobha pooree kar lee aur susajjit ho gayee aur usake svaamee ne samajha ki vah, usase laabhaanvit hone par saamarthy rakhate hain, to akasmaat raat ya din mein hamaara aadesh aa gaya aur hamane use, is prakaar kaatakar rakh diya, jaise ki kal vahaan thee[1] hee nahin. isee prakaar, ham aayaton ka varnan khol-khol kar karate hain, taaki log manan-chintan karen
